attributes.action: Allow driving lessons taught by parents during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: On the official Government website it states that driving lessons taught by parents are not an essential journey. However, I and many others would argue that in a car, one is not exposed to the outside and is safe as long as the persons remain within the car.
attributes.background: Allow parents or guardians to teach driving lessons during the lockdown period

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has changed its guidance to allow non-essential travel. 

Professional driving lessons were also allowed to resume from 4 July.


You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
